[Welcome back!]{.decorativeText} 

In [Part 2](../what){target="blank"}, we discussed the quantitative building blocks of the problem statement we've been working with. In this final article, I'll cover the *how* of the problem statement, focusing on considerations of both design and implementation of the deliverable.

First, let's review the key criteria governing how to display or interact with results:

- [ $h_1$]{.bigMath}: [Results by month]{#msg_h1}

- [ $h_2$]{.bigMath}: [Services and facilities]{#msg_h2}
  
- [ $h_3$]{.bigMath}: [Member demographics]{#msg_h3} 

The relevant part of the problem statement is as follows: 

> $H$: ["... I need to see results by month; all services received and corresponding facilities; and member demographics."]{.quote}.

Keep in mind that the task at hand is to project our measures 
$\Big\langle$
[ $\gamma_1$]{msg_id=g1}, 
[ $\gamma_2$]{msg_id=g2}, 
[ $\gamma_3$]{msg_id=g3}, 
[ $\gamma_4$]{msg_id=g4}, 
[ $\gamma_5$]{msg_id=g5}
$\Big\rangle$
in the context of 
$\Big\langle$
[ $W$]{msg_id=W}, 
[ $\omega_1$]{msg_id=o1},
[ $\omega_2$]{msg_id=o2},
[ $\omega_3$]{msg_id=o3} 
$\Big\rangle$
over 
$\Big\langle$
[ ${h_1}$]{msg_id=h1}, 
[ ${h_2}$]{msg_id=h2}, 
[ ${h_3}$]{msg_id=h3}
$\Big\rangle$ .

**Considerations and Questions:**

- Does the requester want to see the metrics at the ***intersection*** of the three criteria, or ***independently***? 
   - [__Intersection__:]{style="font-size:smaller;"}  $h_1 \wedge h_2 \wedge h_3$ (all must be **concurrently** true)  
   
   - [__Independently__:]{style="font-size:smaller;"} $h_1 \vee h_2 \vee h_3$ (any one of the criteria must be true)


- Does the data product need to be ***interactive*** or ***static***?

   - [__Interactive__:]{style="font-size:smaller;"}
   
   - [__Static__:]{style="font-size:smaller;"}
